section.title: Deliberate Practice: Factoring Quadratic Polynomials
section.p: Algebra is a skill, which means it requires practice to become proficient. But it will take more than rote repetition to get there. Deliberate practice is the thoughtful repetition of a task. For each of these sections, you will be given a list of specific skills or ideas to focus on as you practice thinking through the problems.

li.p: Visualize the grids, but try to do the calculations without drawing them.
Mentally state the "Multiply to" and "Add to" properties. You can write them out as scratch work, if necessary.

worksheet.p: Instructions: Use the ac method to factor using a complete presentation.

exercise.p: Use the ac method to factor x^2 + 2x - 15.
Use the ac method to factor x^2 - 4x + 4.
Use the ac method to factor x^2 + 7x + 12.
Use the ac method to factor x^2 - 9.
Use the ac method to factor x^2 + 8x + 16.
Use the ac method to factor x^2 - x - 42.
Use the ac method to factor 2x^2 + 5x - 3.
Use the ac method to factor 3x^2 - 13x - 10.
Use the ac method to factor 2x^2 - 3x - 20.
Use the ac method to factor 4x^2 + 4x - 15.
